answerText: Sycorax [10] In Shakespeare's The Tempest, this man is the rightful Duke of Milan, although he is deposed by his scheming brother Antonio. Along with his daughter Miranda, he arrives on the island and frees Ariel from the tree.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Chicago B + Yale B | 14 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: She was banished from Algiers for her witchcraft, and she worshiped the god Setebos. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this mother of Caliban, who trapped the air spirit Ariel in a tree.
